org.dataconservancy.packaging.tool.ser

Class XStreamMarshallerFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.dataconservancy.packaging.tool.ser.XStreamMarshallerFactory
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AnnotationDrivenXStreamMarshallerFactory

    public class XStreamMarshallerFactory
extends Object
    Exposes configuration options that are not made available by the Spring XStreamMarshaller class. These options are set on the underlying XStream instance before being returned wrapped by an XStreamMarshaller.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  XStreamMarshallerFactory.ConfiguredXStreamMarshaller 
      class  XStreamMarshallerFactory.LocalConverterHolder
      Encapsulates the properties of a "local" XStream converter: the Converter instance itself, the Class containing the field to be converted, and the name of the field to be converted.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected List<XStreamMarshallerFactory.LocalConverterHolder> localConverters
      Encapsulates the properties of a "local" XStream converter: the class it is defined on, the field containing the instance to be converted, and the Converter itself.

      • registerLocalConverters

        protected void registerLocalConverters(com.thoughtworks.xstream.XStream x)
        Consumes the localConverters List and registers each XStreamMarshallerFactory.LocalConverterHolder on the supplied XStream instance.
        Parameters:

      • getLocalConverters

        public List<XStreamMarshallerFactory.LocalConverterHolder> getLocalConverters()

      • setLocalConverters

        public void setLocalConverters(List<XStreamMarshallerFactory.LocalConverterHolder> localConverters)

      • getEncoding

        public String getEncoding()
        The encoding used when writing to and reading from streams. By default this is set to UTF-8. All XStreamMarshaller instances produced by this factory will have their encoding set.
        Returns:
        the character encoding used by XStreamMarshallers when reading from or writing to streams

      • setEncoding

        public void setEncoding(String encoding)
        The encoding used when writing to and reading from streams. By default this is set to UTF-8. All XStreamMarshaller instances produced by this factory will have their encoding set.
        Parameters:
        encoding - the character encoding used by XStreamMarshallers when reading from or writing to streams
